<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Classification Report V2</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/dlp/api/v1/inventory/object/data-classification/reportv2"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a data classification report. Includes snippet masking status.
